card_name: Dark Scorpion - Cliff the Trap Remover
card_text: When this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: You can activate 1 of these effects.$N●Target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy that target.$N●Send the top 2 cards of their Deck to the GY.
note: Card Name updated from "Cliff the Trap Remover" on June 12, 2012.
